title: When They Were Bad
description: Six women each receive a copy of an old school photo. But why have their faces been scratched out? Within a fortnight, two of them are dead. And the killing doesn't end there. Who has it in for the Class of '98? And can Detective Sergeant Tina Bassett find the answers she believes are lurking in the dark and murky past, before time runs out?
author: Maria Hoey
